scripts.dev: npm run init && concurrently "npm --prefix ./backend/ run dev" "npm --prefix ./frontend/ run dev"
scripts.build: npm run init && npm run clean && npm --prefix ./backend/ run build && npm --prefix ./frontend/ run build
scripts.clean: npm --prefix ./backend/ run clean && npm --prefix ./frontend/ run clean
scripts.update: npm update && npm --prefix ./backend update && npm --prefix ./frontend update
